description.jp:
人情に厚い エクスデスの親衛隊長。
何度もバッツたちの前に立ち塞がるが
元来のマヌケさゆえに主君に見限られ
次元の狭間へと放り込まれてしまう。
戦いを通してバッツたちに友情めいた
ものを感じ始め 遂には命を投げ打って
彼らの窮地を救い 仁義を貫いた。
description.gl: Exdeath's lieutenant and a real mensch. Though he repeatedly faces off against Bartz and the others、 his inborn incompetence eventually gets him banished to the Rift. Noticing his rivalry with Bartz budding into bromance、 he sacrifices himself to help the heroes out of a tight spot、 upholding his code of truth and justice.

jp.text: 来なかったらどうしようかと 不安になっていたところだ！
俺が悪かった……てのはウソだけどな！
おいてけぼりはなしだぜー！
このギルガメッシュ様が……倒せるかな！？
それは！ こっちのセリフだぜ！！

gl.text: Took you long enough、 too... I was just getting worried you might have gotten lost!
I suppose I misjudged! ...NOT! Ha、 I lied! Like a rug! Oh、 I kill me!
Hey! Sidekicks are NOT to ditch the hero!
You cannot even hold a birthday candle to the blazing flame of my winning spirit!
You have admirable companions. I envy you.

name.jp: デスクローエクステンド

desc.en:
「Death Claw」 use +1

When using 「Death Claw」:
- Slightly raises the BRV reduction effect
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Slightly raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Grants a small probability to inflict 「Paralysis」 for 1 turn
- Slightly improves 「Attack Up」
- Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Kotetsu」:
- Slightly raises the BRV reduction effect
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Inflicts 「Melee Resistance Down」 for 1 turn
desc.gl:
Death Claw use +1

When using Death Claw:
 • Slight BRV reduction boost
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Target: Low chance 1 turn Paralyze
 • Slight ATK Up boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Kotetsu:
 • Slight BRV reduction boost
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Target: 1 turn Melee Resist Down
desc.jp:
「デスクロー」の使用回数＋1

「デスクロー」使用時
・BRV割合減少量小アップ
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・小確率で対象に1ACTION「マヒ」付与
・「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップ
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

「虎徹」使用時
・BRV割合減少量小アップ
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・対象に1ACTION「近距離物理耐性ダウン」付与

「Mad Dance」 use +2

When using 「Mad Dance」, 「Wild Dance」:
- Greatly raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Up」
- Grants 1 stack of 「Big Man on the Big Bridge」 for 3 turns (max is 5)

When using 「Genji Blade」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Small Speed Down」 for 3 turns

「Big Man on the Big Bridge」 has the following effects:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「Kotetsu」
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「Genji Blade」
- Raises self Attack based on the number of stacks
- Lowers all enemies' Attack
- At 5 stacks, raises self Critical Hit Rate and Critical Damage

When using Genji Blade:
